input_text:
Job Title: HVACR General Manager

Location: Orlando, FL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
ConServ Building Services is actively seeking a motivated HVACR General Manager to join our team in Orlando! 

 Benefits: 

 Competitive salary  Monthly car allowance  Three weeks of PTO  Performance Bonus  Company cell phone and laptop provided  8 paid federal holidays- effective right away  Direct Deposit every Friday  Excellent Medical, Dental, and Vision- starting at the 1st of the next month, following your start date.  401k with company match- 50¢ on the dollar for the first 5% you contribute.  Company Paid and voluntary Life and AD& D  HSA and FSA Spending Accounts  Short- and Long-Term Disability  Accidental, Critical Illness, and Hospital Indemnity Insurance  Employee Assistance Program  Growth Opportunities 

 ConServ Building Services was founded in 1991, as the service division of BCH Mechanical. We began dispatching HVAC techs in the Tampa Bay, FL area and in just a short time, ConServ’s reputation for customer service and technical expertise began to grow in GA, SC, NC, VA, TN, MS and AL. We are the number one choice for regional clients with multiple accounts, convenience stores, and those who prefer remote monitoring and control. 

 What you will be doing: 

 Manages and develops the Service/ Office Staff, which includes hiring, terminating and disciplining of employees, scheduling employees, setting work priorities, conducting staff meetings, counseling employees, evaluating performance and directing work assignments to ensure effective production/ profit.  Evaluates workload and prioritizes works orders with dispatch department.  Resolves customer issues and complaints to ensure customer satisfaction.  Ensures that material and equipment are ordered in a timely fashion.  Generate reports and measure department performance.  Assists and support in developing new business opportunities.  Evaluates staff to determine training requirements. Assist in hands on training, and scheduling manufacturer training for employees.  Ensure that all employees are observing all company safety requirements. 

 What you need for this position: 

 3-5+ years of Supervisory experience in the Commercial HVAC and Refrigeration Industry  EPA Certification  Must be able to work independently and without supervision  Communication and Customer Service skills  High School Diploma or equivalent  Must have a valid driver’s license 

 Interested in joining the team? 

 Check us out at conservonline.com/careers 

We strive to foster a work environment that includes and embraces racial, ethnic and gender diversity and other individual differences. Our commitment to diversity and inclusion helps us attract and retain the best talent, enables employees to realize their full potential, and drives high performance through innovation and collaboration.

Experience Level (if available): Executive

output_json.title: HVACR General Manager
output_json.summary: ConServ Building Services seeks a motivated HVACR General Manager in Orlando.
job_responsibilities: Manages and develops the Service/ Office Staff
Scheduling employees and setting work priorities
Conducting staff meetings and counseling employees
Evaluating performance and directing work assignments
Evaluates workload and prioritizes works orders
Ensures timely ordering of material and equipment
Generate reports and measure department performance
Assists in developing new business opportunities
Hands-on training and scheduling manufacturer training
Ensure compliance with company safety requirements
benefits: Company cell phone and laptop provided
Company Paid and voluntary Life and AD& D
Accidental, Critical Illness, and Hospital Indemnity Insurance
output_json.company_information: ConServ Building Services was founded in 1991, as the service division of BCH Mechanical.
